name: Victory Run™
description: Victory Run is a racing game modelled on the 'Paris-Dakar Rally' which ran from Paris, France, to Dakar in Senegal. Experience an all-out, realistic rally race where you have to deal with vehicle damage, from engine failure to transmission breakdown. The scenery even changes depending on the time. The exhilarating feeling of speed... Intense crash scenes... Keep it runnin’ right to the end of the unforgiving 13,000 km (8,077 miles) long-haul course! If you own this title on your Wii™, perform a system transfer from your Wii to your Wii U™ to receive a special upgrade price.
